data.text: @ShuckleLuck @GoTwoPinap @NianticHelp @PokemonGoApp @NianticEng I mean I guess that would work, but I don’t know how hard that’ll hit them

@alteredunivers1 @GoTwoPinap @NianticHelp @PokemonGoApp @NianticEng It would hit hard but how many people would join the cause when the big events are so lucrative.
The next rather lack lustre community day would ideal, it’s not a new shiny and it’s not a particularly great Pokémon.

@GoTwoPinap @alteredunivers1 @NianticHelp @PokemonGoApp @NianticEng Yet again they will hear but not listen. Maybe another boycott Is needed but rather than just 1 random day it should be done at a point that would really hit them in the only place they would take notice - their wallet.

@stephaniedovah @GoTwoPinap @NianticHelp @PokemonGoApp @NianticEng That is what they do every time… they are totally out of touch with what makes playing the game fun…. Keep taking out good functionality. Think they are a bit too involved with themselves and making more money then with what the playerbase wants….
@GoTwoPinap @NianticHelp @PokemonGoApp @NianticEng I'm honestly never going to purchase incense again. There's no point. Niantic are breaking something that worked well for absolutely no reason

@GoTwoPinap @ThomasS53215223 @NianticHelp @PokemonGoApp @NianticEng When will they ever learn, when will they ever learn ... Queue a @PokemonGoApp spokesperson quoting their mission statement again ... they just don't seem to get that it's our money and our choice where to spend it ... LI$TEN to the voice of your consumers!
